au_977386: #!/bin/bash
a=$(mktemp)
find /path/to/dir -type f | shuf -n $(shuf -i200000-300000 -n1) >$a
while IFS='' read -r l || [[ -n "$l" ]]; do
    cp "$l" /path/to/out/dir
done <$a
